definition: even number (on a ticket, house etc)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Cars will be restricted based on the odd and even number rule for 46 days, starting today.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，有46天將實行機動車單雙號限行。

sentences.english: Beijing is to ban vehicles with even and odd-numbered license plates on alternate days.
sentences.chinese: 北京在一些日子裏實行車輛牌照單雙號限行。

sentences.english: That entrance over there is for even numbers.
